There’s literally too many to list haha. I came across a video recently (uploaded September 7th) and it showed Justin Bieber gushing over “Dynamite” and the boys, so I wanted to mention him first since that was so recent.  Justin Bieber has shown his love for BTS in a recent video for “E! News.” He did the entire voiceover and stated: “If anyone knows how to make history, it’s BTS. The K-Pop group has been shattering records across the global music industry. From ringing in the New Year in Times Square to Carpool Karaoke with James Corden, they performed in Grand Central Station for The Tonight Show and wowed at this year’s virtual VMAs.” ~ E! News  Throughout the video, Justin just basically goes over all the history-setting records made by BTS and how they continue to be more successful everyday. He ends off by enthusiastically saying: The mainstream K-pop invasion is just beginning! As a big Army, it’s great to see artists like Justin come out and encourage K-pop groups. It’s not something that is so easily earned for these groups and they truly deserve it. Justin’s message was so adorable and I just had to include it…. also since I appreciate it and it was so recent anyways.
